name: Fallen World
storyline: You are Cult (main character of the video game) an occultist who knew that in the future the world would be destroyed and there would be no traces of life, nobody believed you, they branded you as crazy, so you went to a jungle and exiled yourself without anyone looking for you in a cave, you meditated for many years until you woke up from that meditation and your prediction was real, now you embark on an adventure and decide to investigate what or who caused all this, you face creatures never seen before .
summary: An independent 2D Pixel Art style game in which you embark on your adventure to investigate what happened in the world after the disappearance of the human footprint, a prediction you made a long time ago and now you must investigate the events that occurred.
